Package bomberman.core.logic.powerUp

Class Summary
Door The Door is a special PowerUp: it's the access point to the next level.
PowerUp The PowerUp class defines the base model for all the BomberMan powerUps.
PowerUpBomb The PowerUpBomb PowerUp increase the quantity of Bomb that Bomber can place at the same time.
PowerUpBombKick The PowerUpBombKick PowerUp gives Bomber the ability to kick off the Bombs.
PowerUpBombPass The PowerUpBombPass PowerUp gives Bomber the ability to pass over the Bombs.
PowerUpBombRangeDown The PowerUpBombRangeDown PowerUp decrease the Bomb's explosion range.
PowerUpBombRangeUp The PowerUpBombRangeUp PowerUp increase the Bomb's explosion range.
PowerUpLife The PowerUpLife PowerUp gives Bomber one extra life.
PowerUpSkull The PowerUpSkull PowerUp adds a disease effect to the Bomber.
PowerUpSpeedDown The PowerUpSpeedDown PowerUp decreases the movement speed of the Bomber.
PowerUpSpeedUp The PowerUpSpeedUp PowerUp increases the movement speed of the Bomber.
PowerUpTimeDown The PowerUpTimeDown PowerUp removes time to the Timer.
PowerUpTimeUp The PowerUpTimeUp PowerUp add some additional time to the Timer.
 

Enum Summary
PowerUpEnum The Enum PowerUpEnum is the access point for reflection-based instantiating PowerUps.
